product_name: Merrell Ngeo Polo Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Merrell Ngeo Polo Shirt features classic polo styling and soft, synthetic fabric so you'll look sharp and stay comfortable when traveling or running around town. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking polyester keeps your skin dry and cool and is blended with a touch of elastane for ample stretch. Fabric provides UPF 20 protection from harmful ultraviolet rays. Fabric performs like a synthetic but feels like cotton for excellent comfort. Offset shoulder seams are smooth under backpack straps. Closeout.
short_description: The Merrell Ngeo Polo Shirt features classic polo styling and soft, synthetic fabric so you'll look sharp and stay comfortable when traveling or running around town.
